verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהֹוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּר֮ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְיָשֻׁ֗בוּ <S%H7725><s%> that they turn וְיַחֲנוּ֙ <S%H2583><s%> and encamp לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before פִּ֣י הַחִירֹ֔ת <S%H6367><s%> Pihahiroth בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between מִגְדֹּ֖ל <S%H4024><s%> between Migdol וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> and the sea לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> over against בַּ֣עַל צְפֹ֔ן <S%H1189><s%> Baalzephon נִכְח֥וֹ <S%H5226><s%> before תַחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> it shall ye encamp עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by הַיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> by the sea

וְאָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> will say פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> For Pharaoh לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נְבֻכִ֥ים <S%H943><s%> They [are] entangled הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> in בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land סָגַ֥ר <S%H5462><s%> hath shut them in עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> the wilderness

וְחִזַּקְתִּ֣י <S%H2388><s%> And I will harden אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵב־ <S%H3820><s%> heart פַּרְעֹה֮ <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh's וְרָדַ֣ף <S%H7291><s%> that he shall follow אַחֲרֵיהֶם֒ <S%H310><s%> after וְאִכָּבְדָ֤ה <S%H3513><s%> them and I will be honoured בְּפַרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> upon Pharaoh וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חֵיל֔וֹ <S%H2426><s%> army וְיָדְע֥וּ <S%H3045><s%> may know מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> And they did כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> so

וַיֻּגַּד֙ <S%H5046><s%> And it was told לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for בָרַ֖ח <S%H1272><s%> fled הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> that the people וַ֠יֵּהָפֵךְ <S%H2015><s%> was turned לְבַ֨ב <S%H3824><s%> and the heart פַּרְעֹ֤ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh וַעֲבָדָיו֙ <S%H5650><s%> and of his servants אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> against the people וַיֹּֽאמרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and they said מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What זֹּ֣את <S%H2063><s%> we עָשִׂ֔ינוּ <S%H6213><s%> Why have we done כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שִׁלַּ֥חְנוּ <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> this that we have let Israel מֵעָבְדֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H5647><s%> from serving

וַיֶּאְסֹ֖ר <S%H631><s%> And he made ready אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רִכְבּ֑וֹ <S%H7393><s%> his chariot וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people לָקַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> and took עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> and he

וַיִּקַּ֗ח <S%H3947><s%> And he took שֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> six מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred רֶ֙כֶב֙ <S%H7393><s%> chariots בָּח֔וּר <S%H970><s%> young וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all רֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> and all the chariots מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְשָׁלִשִׁ֖ם <S%H7991><s%> and captains עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כֻּלּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

וַיְחַזֵּ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> hardened יְהֹוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵ֤ב <S%H3820><s%> the heart פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַיִּרְדֹּ֕ף <S%H7291><s%> and he pursued אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יֹצְאִ֖ים <S%H3318><s%> went out בְּיָ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> hand רָמָֽה׃ <S%H7311><s%> with an high

וַיִּרְדְּפ֨וּ <S%H7291><s%> pursued מִצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H310><s%> after וַיַּשִּׂ֤יגוּ <S%H5381><s%> and overtook אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> חֹנִ֣ים <S%H2583><s%> them encamping עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> by the sea כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> them all סוּס֙ <S%H5483><s%> them all the horses רֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> [and] chariots פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh וּפָרָשָׁ֖יו <S%H6571><s%> and his horsemen וְחֵיל֑וֹ <S%H2428><s%> and his army עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside פִּי֙ הַֽחִירֹ֔ת <S%H6367><s%> beside Pihahiroth לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before בַּ֥עַל צְפֹֽן׃ <S%H1189><s%> Baalzephon

וּפַרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> And when Pharaoh הִקְרִ֑יב <S%H7126><s%> drew nigh וַיִּשְׂאוּ֩ <S%H5375><s%> lifted up בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H5869><s%> their eyes וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold מִצְרַ֣יִם ׀ <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian נֹסֵ֣עַ <S%H5265><s%> marched אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H310><s%> after וַיִּֽירְאוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> afraid מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> them and they were sore וַיִּצְעֲק֥וּ <S%H6817><s%> cried out בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֮ <S%H559><s%> And they said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁה֒ <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses הַֽמִבְּלִ֤י <S%H1097><s%> corruption אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> there קְבָרִים֙ <S%H6913><s%> Because [there were] no graves בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt לְקַחְתָּ֖נוּ <S%H3947><s%> hast thou taken us away לָמ֣וּת <S%H4191><s%> to die בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> desert מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how long זֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> have you עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> hast thou dealt לָּ֔נוּ לְהוֹצִיאָ֖נוּ <S%H3318><s%> thus with us to carry us forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> Egypt

הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> is this הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> [Is] not this the word אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> we דִּבַּ֨רְנוּ <S%H1696><s%> that we did tell אֵלֶ֤יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you בְמִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> thee in Egypt לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying חֲדַ֥ל <S%H2308><s%> Let us alone מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> alone וְנַֽעַבְדָ֣ה <S%H5647><s%> that we may serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good לָ֙נוּ֙ עֲבֹ֣ד <S%H5647><s%> for us to serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian מִמֻּתֵ֖נוּ <S%H4191><s%> than that we should die בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָם֮ <S%H5971><s%> unto the people אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָאוּ֒ <S%H3372><s%> Fear הִֽתְיַצְב֗וּ <S%H3320><s%> ye not stand still וּרְאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> and see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְשׁוּעַ֣ת <S%H3444><s%> the salvation יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> which he will shew לָכֶ֖ם הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to you to day כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whom רְאִיתֶ֤ם <S%H7200><s%> whom ye have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to day לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תֹסִ֛יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> them again לִרְאֹתָ֥ם <S%H7200><s%> ye shall see ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> no more for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever
יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD יִלָּחֵ֣ם <S%H3898><s%> shall fight לָכֶ֑ם וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you תַּחֲרִישֽׁוּן׃ <S%H2790><s%> for you and ye shall hold your peace פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why תִּצְעַ֖ק <S%H6817><s%> Wherefore criest אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to דַּבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> thou unto me? speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְיִסָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5265><s%> that they go forward

וְאַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> you הָרֵ֣ם <S%H7311><s%> But lift thou up אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מַטְּךָ֗ <S%H4294><s%> thy rod וּנְטֵ֧ה <S%H5186><s%> and stretch out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדְךָ֛ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> over the sea וּבְקָעֵ֑הוּ <S%H1234><s%> and divide וְיָבֹ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall go בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> it and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> [ground] through the midst הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea בַּיַּבָּשָֽׁה׃ <S%H3004><s%> on dry

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> behold מְחַזֵּק֙ <S%H2388><s%> And I behold I will harden אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> the hearts מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian וְיָבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they shall follow אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> them וְאִכָּבְדָ֤ה <S%H3513><s%> and I will get me honour בְּפַרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> upon Pharaoh וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חֵיל֔וֹ <S%H2426><s%> army בְּרִכְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7393><s%> upon his chariots וּבְפָרָשָֽׁיו׃ <S%H6571><s%> and upon his horsemen

וְיָדְע֥וּ <S%H3045><s%> shall know מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD בְּהִכָּבְדִ֣י <S%H3513><s%> when I have gotten me honour בְּפַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> upon Pharaoh בְּרִכְבּ֖וֹ <S%H7393><s%> upon his chariots וּבְפָרָשָֽׁיו׃ <S%H6571><s%> and upon his horsemen

וַיִּסַּ֞ע <S%H5265><s%> removed מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> And the angel הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God הַהֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> which went לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went מֵאַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> behind וַיִּסַּ֞ע <S%H5265><s%> went עַמּ֤וּד <S%H5982><s%> them and the pillar הֶֽעָנָן֙ <S%H6051><s%> of the cloud מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> from before their face וַיַּֽעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood מֵאַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> behind

וַיָּבֹ֞א <S%H935><s%> And it came בֵּ֣ין ׀ <S%H996><s%> between מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> between the camp מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> of the Egyptians וּבֵין֙ <S%H996><s%> between מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> and the camp יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become הֶֽעָנָן֙ <S%H6051><s%> and it was a cloud וְהַחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> and darkness וַיָּ֖אֶר <S%H215><s%> [to them] but it gave light אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלָּ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not קָרַ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> [to these] so that the one came not near זֶ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> the other אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> the other כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> all the night

וַיֵּ֨ט <S%H5186><s%> stretched out מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדוֹ֮ <S%H3027><s%> his hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַיָּם֒ <S%H3220><s%> over the sea וַיּ֣וֹלֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> swept יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֠יָּם <S%H3220><s%> caused the sea בְּר֨וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind קָדִ֤ים <S%H6921><s%> east עַזָּה֙ <S%H5794><s%> [back] by a strong כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> all that night וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea לֶחָרָבָ֑ה <S%H2724><s%> dry וַיִּבָּקְע֖וּ <S%H1234><s%> were divided הַמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> [land] and the waters
